title: Russia fines Google more than world's entire GDP
text: Google has reportedly racked up a fine of more than two undecillion rubles (two followed by 36 zeros) after it removed state-run and pro-government accounts from YouTube.

title: Tech Flexes Earnings Power: A Closer Look
text: The market loved the Tesla report last week and had a similar reaction to the Alphabet release, which have both helped kick off the reporting cycle for the Mag 7 group.

title: Tech Flexes Earnings Power: A Closer Look
text: The market loved the Tesla report last week and had a similar reaction to the Alphabet release, which have both helped kick off the reporting cycle for the Mag 7 group.

title: Google Pops On Great Results, The Prospect Of Cloud Growth
text: Shares of Google parent Alphabet Inc. jumped after management announced robust revenue and earnings results, driven in party by continued improvements in the cloud. Big investments in this space should continue to push revenue and profits higher as the rest of the business continues to grow as well. Shares aren't cheap, but they are attractive enough for the quality and growth received to warrant additional upside from here.

title: Google's Q3 Results Prove YouTube Could Be Worth $750 Billion By 2027
text: Alphabet Inc. aka Google just reported Q3 earnings, delivering great results in Search, Cloud, and YouTube. YouTube is of particular interest to us given the potential for significant monetization growth in coming years. YouTube could be worth — conservatively — $750 billion+ by 2027, which could add 20% or more to GOOG's market cap in just a few short years.

title: Dow and S&P 500 climb as earnings season heats up; Alphabet jumps, Semi Micro sinks
text: US equity benchmarks rose on Wednesday as investors assessed a string of earnings reports and waited for more results from megacap technology companies.  At the time of writing, the Dow Jones Industrial Average was up 0.3%, while the S&P 500 index rose 0.1% from the previous close.

title: Alphabet 'At The Forefront Of The AI Race': Analysts See Attractive Valuation; Highlight Cloud, YouTube, Search Results
text: Alphabet Inc GOOG GOOGL is viewed favorably by analysts after showing strength in cloud, search and YouTube segments and spending on AI initiatives paying off, after the company reported third-quarter financial results Tuesday.

title: Alphabet To Rally Around 33%? Here Are 10 Top Analyst Forecasts For Wednesday
text: Top Wall Street analysts changed their outlook on these top names. For a complete view of all analyst rating changes, including upgrades and downgrades, please see our analyst ratings page.

title: Google and Visa Just Crushed Earnings. Time to Buy?
text: Google parent Alphabet (NASDAQ:GOOG)(NASDAQ:GOOGL) and Visa (NYSE:V) reported quarterly earnings and absolutely hit it out of the park.

title: Google hit with astronomical fine by Russian court over media restrictions
text: A Russian court has fined Google 2 undecillion rubles, an astronomical amount equivalent to about US$20 decillion, in a dispute over restricted Russian media channels on YouTube. The fine, which is nearly 200 trillion times the global money supply, was calculated based on the removal of 17 Russian TV channels following US sanctions imposed in 2020 and expanded after Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

title: Why Analysts Are Bullish on Google Parent Alphabet After Earnings
text: Google parent Alphabet (GOOGL) posted third-quarter earnings that topped Street expectations and showed artificial intelligence (AI) progress, with both JPMorgan and Citigroup analysts noting the tech giant's strong Google Cloud revenue.

title: S&P500 and Nasdaq Index: Cloud Gains Lift Alphabet, but AMD Drags on Market
text: Alphabet leads tech as Nasdaq hits highs, while AMD and Super Micro slump on earnings misses. Mixed signals keep investors cautious on US stock outlook.

title: Google Soars on Upbeat Q3 Earnings: ETFs to Consider
text: Look at Google-heavy ETFs to capitalize as upbeat third-quarter 2024 results send GOOGL shares soaring.

title: Can Solid Q3 Earnings Beat & Encouraging View Push GOOGL Stock Higher?
text: Alphabet's third-quarter 2024 results benefit from strength in Search, advertising revenues and Google Cloud.

title: Google: AI Leads The Way Higher
text: Google reported strong growth driven by AI, boosting Search advertising and Cloud revenue. The company smashed analyst estimates by $2.1 billion, with Cloud revenue growing 35% YoY, reaching an $11 billion quarterly run rate. Despite one-time charges, Google beat EPS targets, trading at 22x forward earnings, cheaper than Apple, Microsoft, and Meta.

title: A Russian court hit Google with a fine larger than the world's GDP, stretching credulity
text: A Russian court fined Google for not restoring YouTube accounts linked to Russian TV channels. The fine is about $20.6 decillion — a figure many orders of magnitude beyond the world's GDP.

title: Cloud Revenue Surges for GOOGL, Legal Headwinds "Overblown"
text: Ahmed Khan says he's "really impressed" by Alphabet's (GOOGL) earnings report. He argues the company created enough of a tailwind to thrust itself through any roadblock.

title: Google Big Earnings Pop (Technical Analysis)
text: Alphabet (GOOGL) saw a 5.8% after-market pop post-earnings, challenging our SID Sell signal driven by technical and fundamental analysis. Positive signals before earnings included strong Demand on the 20-day chart and a Buy signal in the SAR column, indicating smart money activity. Despite the earnings bounce, our SID signal remains Sell due to a price drop testing the 200-day uptrend, requiring further good news for a Buy signal.

title: Alphabet says Spotify, Paramount sign to use new cloud chip
text: Google Cloud, a unit of Alphabet Inc , said on Wednesday that Spotify Technology and Paramount Global are using a new chip that it designed with technology from Arm Holdings to power their streaming services.

title: Why One Analyst Says Alphabet Remains a Top Stock Pick After Earnings
text: Alphabet stock is higher after the Google parent reported strong advertising and cloud growth in Q3. Here's why one analyst thinks there's more to come.

title: Google accused of imposing illegal ‘gag order' blocking workers from discussing antitrust cases
text: A union representing many Google employees is demanding the company lift what it described as an illegal “gag order” barring them from discussing landmark antitrust cases that could upend the Big Tech giant's business.

title: Why Alphabet (GOOGL) is a Top Momentum Stock for the Long-Term
text: Wondering how to pick strong, market-beating stocks for your investment portfolio? Look no further than the Zacks Style Scores.

title: Alphabet Stock Pops After AI Boosts Results
text: Shares of Google parent Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ:GOOGL) are on the rise today, after the tech giant beat third-quarter earnings and revenue expectations following a 35% rise in cloud revenue.

title: GOOGL's "Beat Across the Board" & Previewing META Earnings
text: Shweta Khajuria calls Alphabet's (GOOGL) cloud revenue a "big surprise" that shows the company's A.I. strength. She leaned positive heading into the tech giant's earnings report but makes the case for bears to reemerge on the stock.

title: Google: Why I'm Still Bullish After The Post-Earnings Surge
text: Alphabet's Q3-2024 earnings surpassed expectations with revenue at $88.27 billion (up 16% in CC) and adjusted EPS at $2.12 (up 36.8%), driving the stock price higher. Google Cloud's revenue surged 35%, and its operating margin surged as well, highlighting its growing importance to Alphabet's overall business. Despite a year-over-year decline in free cash flow due to deferred tax payments, fines, and increased CapEx, a rebound is expected in the coming quarters.

title: GOOGL Flexes A.I. Growth, AMD Needs More Muscle
text: Alphabet (GOOGL) is up thanks to an earnings beat and strong cloud growth. Cory Johnson says its "hard to imagine" Alphabet growing at its scale but makes the case for the Mag 7 giant.

title: Alphabet's Google remains the 'king' of search despite AI threat, says leading investment bank
text: Wedbush reiterated its “outperform” rating for Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ:GOOG), Google's parent company, with a price target of $210 per share, highlighting Alphabet's strong third-quarter results and resilience in a challenging digital landscape, with competition coming from the nascent AI sector. The report, titled “Come At The Search King, Best Not Miss”, underscores that despite rivals targeting Google's dominance in search, Alphabet's innovations in artificial intelligence and cloud services have kept it ahead of the pack.

title: Alphabet quiets the doubters with ‘all-around' strength that sends stock soaring
text: “We believe that this ship is sailing smoothly and doing everything right,” an analyst says.

text: The stock market is giving Big Tech tougher demands for its continued support.

title: Alphabet Posts Strong Earnings With Microsoft Scheduled To Report After The Close
text: Key Takeaways

title: Analysts revise Google stock price target
text: Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOGL) experienced an extended session surge in the night between October 29 and October 30 as it unveiled a particularly strong third-quarter (Q3) earnings report.

title: Google's Strong Q3 Earnings: What It Means For Your Portfolio Strategy
text: Google has shown strong Q3 2024 earnings results, announcing earnings per share of $2.12, an increase of 37% compared to the same quarter of the previous year. Alphabet's Total Return of 19.67% over the past 12-months has been significantly below that of Microsoft (29.61%), Apple (33.40%), Amazon (47.18%), and Meta (80.08%). Given its presently attractive Valuation (P/E [FWD] Ratio of 21.79), financial health and competitive edge, I maintain a strong buy rating for GOOGL.

title: Google Gets No Respect From Wall Street: Still The Best Buy In Tech
text: After a blowout Q3, Wall Street's current earnings estimates for Google are likely too low and will be revised higher, driven by the company's success in cloud computing. Google's earnings quality and growth are superior to peers, making its lower valuation compared to Apple and other tech giants increasingly unjustified. This presents a buying opportunity. GOOGL deserves to be a more popular stock than it is.

title: Digital ad sellers jump as Google, Reddit and Snap earnings indicate sturdy demand
text: Shares of online ad sellers surged on Wednesday as strong earnings from Google-parent Alphabet, Reddit and Snap signaled solid spending from brands ahead of the crucial holiday season.

title: US Stocks Likely To Open Higher As Investors Eye GDP Print, Strong Alphabet Results To Kick Off 'Mag 7' Earnings Week: Strategist Flags November As 'Best Month Of The Year' For Markets

title: Google Looks More to What It Can Control
text: Robust earnings growth and signals on cost control could lift some of the fog of regulatory worry.

title: Google: It Can't Get Any Better Than This
text: Google's Q3 earnings exceeded expectations, driven by strong Search and Cloud top line growth, with Cloud revenues surging 35% year-over-year. GOOG's low valuation and high operating income potential in Cloud especially translate to strong investment value. GOOGL's free cash flow margins expanded Q/Q to 20%, highlighting the strength of its Cloud operations as well as Search.

title: Nvidia Stock Slips. Why Alphabet, AMD Earnings Are Giving Mixed Signals.

title: Google's AI-fuelled gains in cloud bode well for Amazon, Microsoft
text: Google-parent Alphabet's breakout cloud sales in the July-September quarter bode well for top cloud providers Microsoft and Amazon.com , and signal that market for AI-aided computing power is only growing.
